All Classes

  • Class Description
    App
    Hello world! No it's joke :) Main class of IoT
    AppTest
    Unit test for simple App.
    AvailablePrograms
    Describe available lights programs
    AvailableTriggers
    Describe available triggers
    BluetoothScanner
    to search for Bluetooth devices in vicinity results are saved to result.csv file in format device address,avg rssi to file is appended timestamp as last line
    CColors
    Contains available colours for console
    ConsoleParser
    Is a one of modules used to parse command line input Main purpose is to read input stream from console, parse it and write commands to proper file in Messages module
    Controller
    Class is main module of light control system For each second class check if some triggers was fired if new order come and it is triggered run new program this case is special and needed because if trigger for previous order was fired and trigger for new order will be fired too, so system treat it as there was no change at all Surely it's mistake, so that's the point for special if clause Case in which for previous order trigger was fired and now is not is covered in 4th if clause if previously trigger was not fired but now is it's high time to execute program if previously trigger was fired and now is also fired just idle if previously trigger was fired but now it is not it's time to switch off lights
    EnumUtil
    Class containing some utilities for operations on Enumerations
    LightMessage
    Is used as part of communication between user and system.
    LightParser
    Parse information form console into file, which later on will be read by ReadLightMessage class
    MessageNotFoundException
    Thrown when no new Message was found in swap.file
    MessageSource
    Describe form which place Read*******Message class should read
    ParserModel  
    ParsingError
    Thrown if something goes wrong during console parsing
    Printer
    Used to maintain logging from modules, because standard output is used as console
    ProgramConstantWhite  
    ProgramModel
    Basic class for light control model
    ProgramOff
    Program to permanently switch off lights
    ReadLightMessage
    Class reads orders from swap files Messages/LightMessage/message.swap If no new orders was found class throw exception MessageNotFoundException If new order was found class check what program was mentioned in it and whats triggers was in it, and returns it as LightMessage class object
    TagVicinity
    This trigger check if any of known devices are in vicinity Firstly it reads file with known devices Compares it with scan results Returns true if both file contains at least one common line and signal was strength enough
    TriggerModel
